card.name: Cold Winter
card.description: Look at {{CARD:9|1}}, {{CARD:10|1}} and {{CARD:31|1}} and choose one to burn. Add the others to your hand.

description.now: Look at {{CARD:9|1}}, {{CARD:10|1}} and {{CARD:31|1}} and choose one to burn. Add the others to your hand.
description.prev: {{KW:PARALYZE}} an enemy monster and the one on its left. If already paralyzed, deal 2 {{DMG}} to it instead.
